<br><br>![](about_img.jpg){width=350px}<p style="font-size: 22px; text-align:left">Hi, I'm Aspen. <br><br> 
My innate curiosity, flair for creativity, and natural tendency toward structure and logic have paved the way for my career in data. Blending seamlessly with my proficiencies in Python, SQL, Tableau, Pandas, Excel, VBA, JavaScript, D3, HTML, CSS, and PySpark (to name a few), I am a natural problem solver, process improver, and  critical thinker. After 3 years of experience in data collection and response, a meticulous 24 week Data Analytics course through UC Berkeley, teaching myself how to build my own website, and the various analytics/coding projects and visualizations I've produced, I am ready to take root in a long term role where I can contribute my experience and skillset in a meaningful way.</p>
